Header.title: S imam ~prints
Header.paragraph: From screen printing to DTF, custom mugs to branding services — we deliver premium quality at affordable prices.

About.paragraph: At Imam Prints, we’re passionate about delivering premium-quality printing with a modern edge. Proudly based in Kano, Nigeria, we specialize in fast, affordable, and eye-catching custom prints for individuals, businesses, and events. From design to delivery — we’ve got you covered.

Services.name: Screen Printing
Services.text: High-quality screen printing for t-shirts, uniforms, and promotional items — perfect for bulk orders with sharp designs.

Services.name: DTF (Direct to Film)
Services.text: Get vibrant and durable prints with our Direct-to-Film service, suitable for detailed graphics on any fabric type.

Services.name: Mug Printing
Services.text: Personalized mug printing for birthdays, brands, or giveaways — make every sip memorable.

Services.name: Branding & Packaging
Services.text: Boost your business identity with custom packaging, branded boxes, stickers, and tags that stand out.

Services.name: Sublimation Printing
Services.text: Full-color sublimation printing on fabrics and items — long-lasting and washable with no cracking or fading.

Services.name: Corporate Gifting
Services.text: Custom gift items for your clients or staff — mugs, tees, key holders, and branded kits to make a lasting impression.

Testimonials.name: Aisha Abdullahi
Testimonials.text: Their designs are so clean and professional. I was impressed with the delivery speed too!

Testimonials.name: Musa Usman
Testimonials.text: Sun kammala min odar t-shirt da poster cikin lokaci. Na ji dadin sabis ɗin su sosai.

Testimonials.name: Fatima Sani
Testimonials.text: The quality of the flyers I received was top-notch. Definitely recommending to my friends!

Testimonials.name: Abdullahi Garba
Testimonials.text: Na buga calendar da invitation cards, kuma duk sun zo cikin tsari da kyau.

Contact.address: Na'ibawa Layin Dan Hassan, Zaria Road. Kano

Features.title: Responsive Support
Features.text: We offer quick and helpful customer service to ensure your printing needs are met without delay.

Features.title: High-Quality Prints
Features.text: Our modern equipment delivers sharp, vibrant, and durable prints for all kinds of materials.

Features.title: Experienced Team
Features.text: Our skilled professionals work closely with you to bring your ideas to life, exactly how you want them.

Features.title: Custom Finishing
Features.text: We provide special finishing options like lamination, cutting, folding, and more to give your prints a unique edge.
